item.title: Dell 27" QHD U2711b + QNIX 27" QHD IPS (110hz) Monitors
item.author: invalid@example.com (Danthemanz)
item.dc:creator: Danthemanz
item.content:encoded:
Ive finally decided to start selling off my three monitors and go with a single 38" Ultra wide, ordered this afternoon

Item 1:
Dell 27" QHD U2711 IPS

Ive had this for quite a few years ago, such amazing colour and contrast i bought two. I calibrated it late last year and looks fantastic, just keep the same custom RGB settings in the OSD and the colour still blows away anything ive seen for sale under $1000 in years.
One thing ive noticed is the power button is flaky. The last two...

Dell 27" QHD U2711b + QNIX 27" QHD IPS (110hz) Monitors

item.dc:creator: snoopdoge
item.content:encoded:
Click to view full size!

Reposting sale - price reduced!
Selling the above dual pump res combo as it is surplus to my needs. All in good working order, but the bayres could do with a good rinse. Silver coil is included within. Only ran with distilled water.

Exact product link found here: http://www.xs-pc.com/water-pumps/twin-d5-dual-bay-reservoirpump-combo

Have original box for bayres but not for pumps, will include ek pump boxes.
Buyer pays postage or pickup at 2200/Sydney CBD....
